Others: The Diamondbacks lost a game in which they led by eight runs for the first time in franchise history.
The Diamondbacks dropped to the third and final wild card spot in the National League.
The Diamondbacks bullpen had a major-league worst 6.84 bullpen ERA in September.
In September, the Diamondbacks bullpen ranked dead last among playoff contenders in ERA and WHIP.
The Diamondbacks have scored the most runs in baseball in 2024.
The 2023 Diamondbacks went all the way to the World Series in spite of a bullpen that had a 4.22 ERA and 1.30 WHIP in the regular season.
The Diamondbacks bullpen had a 2.31 ERA in the postseason in 2023.
The Diamondbacks bullpen struggled in September, allowing seven runs (six earned) as a unit in 3 2/3 innings on Sunday.
